meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bland.
meanings.sent1: The blandness of the soup made it unappetizing.
meanings.sent2: Her speech was filled with blandness, putting everyone to sleep.
meanings.sent3: The blandness of the party was so extreme that even the balloons seemed bored.
meanings.sent4: The blandness of the painting left the viewers feeling empty inside.
meanings.sent5: The blandness of the music was like a colorless painting for the ears.

meanings.definition: Lack of excitement or interest; dullness.
meanings.sent1: The blandness of the movie made it hard to stay awake.
meanings.sent2: His jokes were met with blandness, no one even chuckled.
meanings.sent3: The blandness of the game was so extreme that even the referee yawned.
meanings.sent4: The blandness of the book left the readers feeling like they wasted their time.
meanings.sent5: The blandness of the lecture was like a lullaby without the melody.
